languages.text: Священные обломки пострадавшего от запуска Горнила монастыря будут перенесены на спутник Фолстоуна. Снабженная двигателями вооруженная луна сойдет с орбиты и отправится в странствие как храмовая комета.

The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon. Equipped with drives, the weaponised moon will leave orbit and set out on a crusade as a temple comet.
languages.original_text: Священные обломки пострадавшего от запуска Горнила монастыря будут перенесены на спутник Фолстоуна. Снабженная двигателями вооруженная луна сойдет с орбиты и отправится в странствие как храмовая комета.

The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon, which will be equipped with drives and turned into a sacred comet.

languages.text: Les vestiges du monastère, endommagé par le lancement du Creuset, seront transférés sur la lune de Rochepeste. Équipée de réacteurs, l'astre militarisé quittera l'orbite et partira en croisade en tant que comète sacrée
languages.original_text: The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon. Equipped with drives, the weaponised moon will leave orbit and set out on a crusade as a temple comet.

traits.locale_text: Les vestiges du monastère, endommagé par le lancement du Creuset, seront transférés sur la lune de Rochepeste. Équipée de réacteurs, l'astre militarisé quittera l'orbite et partira en croisade en tant que comète sacrée

languages.text: 坩堝の発動によって損傷した修道院の神聖な遺跡は、ファウルストーンの月に移送される。ドライブが備えられ、兵器化された月は軌道を離れ、 寺院の彗星として聖戦に出発する。
languages.original_text: The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon. Equipped with drives, the weaponised moon will leave orbit and set out on a crusade as a temple comet.

traits.locale_text: 坩堝の発動によって損傷した修道院の神聖な遺跡は、ファウルストーンの月に移送される。ドライブが備えられ、兵器化された月は軌道を離れ、 寺院の彗星として聖戦に出発する。

languages.text: 被熔炉摧毁的修道院将会被装上驱动器，变成一颗神圣的彗星，前往荒寂岩地，成为那颗行星的卫星。这颗被改造过的彗星将会离开轨道，化为一颗圣殿彗星，在广袤的宇宙中征战。
languages.original_text: The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon. Equipped with drives, the weaponised moon will leave orbit and set out on a crusade as a temple comet.

traits.locale_text: 被熔炉摧毁的修道院将会被装上驱动器，变成一颗神圣的彗星，前往荒寂岩地，成为那颗行星的卫星。这颗被改造过的彗星将会离开轨道，化为一颗圣殿彗星，在广袤的宇宙中征战。

languages.text: Los restos sagrados del monasterio, dañados por el lanzamiento del crisol, se trasladarán a la luna de Rocainmunda. Equipada con impulsores, la luna militarizada dejará la órbita para convertirse en cometa templo.
languages.original_text: The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon. Equipped with drives, the weaponised moon will leave orbit and set out on a crusade as a temple comet.

traits.locale_text: Los restos sagrados del monasterio, dañados por el lanzamiento del crisol, se trasladarán a la luna de Rocainmunda. Equipada con impulsores, la luna militarizada dejará la órbita para convertirse en cometa templo.

languages.text: Die heiligen Überreste des Klosters, das beim Start des Tiegels beschädigt wurde, werden auf den Mond von Foulstone gebracht. Der Trabant wird mit Waffen und Triebwerken ausgestattet, seinen Orbit verlassen und als Tempelkomet einen Kreuzzug beginnen.
languages.original_text: The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon. Equipped with drives, the weaponised moon will leave orbit and set out on a crusade as a temple comet.

traits.locale_text: Die heiligen Überreste des Klosters, das beim Start des Tiegels beschädigt wurde, werden auf den Mond von Foulstone gebracht. Der Trabant wird mit Waffen und Triebwerken ausgestattet, seinen Orbit verlassen und als Tempelkomet einen Kreuzzug beginnen.

languages.text: Pota'dan ötürü hasar gören manastırın kutsal kalıntıları, Menfurtaş'ın uydusuna taşınacak. İticilerle ve silahlarla donatılacak olan uydu, yörüngesinden ayrılarak tapınak vasıflı bir kuyruklu yıldız şeklinde cihada çıkacak.
languages.original_text: The holy remains of the monastery, which was damaged by the launch of the Crucible, will be transferred to Foulstone's moon. Equipped with drives, the weaponised moon will leave orbit and set out on a crusade as a temple comet.
